titles.title: Providing for an adjournment of the two Houses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Failed by recorded vote: 67 - 278 (Roll no. 155).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/22/1997--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives on May 22 or 23 until June 3, 1997, and a recess or adjournment of the Senate from May 22, 23, or 24 until June 2, 1997.
